definition: various genera of flowers of Asteracea family (daisies and chrysanthemums), including Atractylis lancea

mark/sign/label/to mark with a symbol, label, lettering etc/to bear (a brand name, registration number etc)/prize/award/bid/target/quota/(old) the topmost branches of a tree/visible symptom/classifier for military units

sentences.english: The article analyzed the relevant tactical problems of enterprise's technical standard finally.
sentences.chinese: 文章最後分析了企業技術標準策略的相關問顥。

sentences.english: None of the conceptual design issues deals with technology standards or their implementations.
sentences.chinese: 概要設計問題不會涉及到任何技術標準或其具體實現。

sentences.english: There need to be new technical standards.
sentences.chinese: 人們需要新的技術標準。

sentences.english: Preliminaries on the Principles on Literate Standard of Toponym Standardization;
sentences.chinese: 技術標準是企業標準化系統的主體。

sentences.english: The anti-forgery properties of the passports shall be based on international technical standards.
sentences.chinese: 護照的防僞性能參照國際技術標準制定。

sentences.english: Other parts of industrial policy have misfired, such as attempts to support domestic technology by setting standards.
sentences.chinese: 比如中國嘗試建立自己的技術標準遭遇失敗。

sentences.english: Have they documented any of their technology standards or processes?
sentences.chinese: 他們是否對技術標準或者過程編制了文檔？

sentences.english: What happens if I do adhere to technology standards?
sentences.chinese: 如果遵循了技術標準結果又是怎樣？

sentences.english: Staying abreast of technology standards is often associated with organizational efficiency.
sentences.chinese: 與技術標準保持一致常常有助於提高組織的效率。

sentences.english: SC3 Technology Committee, responsible for quality and technology standards.
sentences.chinese: SC3分技術委員會負責質量技術標準的制訂。

sentences.english: Fibre Channel Arbitrated Loop is the most widely accepted standard of Fibre Channel.
sentences.chinese: 光纖通道仲裁環是最爲廣泛接受的光纖通道技術標準。
